sentences.en: ...a match that is likely to prove one of the highlights of the tournament.
sentences.cn: …可能是本届锦标赛最精彩的赛事之一。

sentences.en: Fiduciary Issue has been the highlight in the construction of securities market.
sentences.cn: 诚信问题已经成为证券市场建设中人们普遍关注的问题.

sentences.en: Her performance was the highlight of the show.
sentences.cn: 她的表演是那场演出中最精彩的部分.

sentences.en: Highlight RI Anniversary on 23 February - World Understanding and Peace Day.
sentences.cn: 强调2月23日的国际扶轮周年纪念─世界了解及和平日.

sentences.en: Highlight the chosen area by clicking and holding down the left mouse button.
sentences.cn: 通过点击鼠标左键并摁住以突出显示所选区域。

sentences.en: I thought the highlight of the show was the cashmere coat.
sentences.cn: 我觉得表演中最精彩的要属开司米外衣.

sentences.en: It's set to a 1 px highlight on the bottom right.
sentences.cn: 在右下部设置了1个像素的高光.

sentences.en: Last year Collins wrote a moving ballad which highlighted the plight of the homeless.
sentences.cn: 去年柯林斯写了一首感人的叙事诗，突出描写了无家可归者的苦境。

sentences.en: Lumbar shoulder dish how to highlight ability to cure?
sentences.cn: 腰肩盘突出怎么样才能治愈?

sentences.en: Once again, the 'Free Press' prefers not to highlight these facts.
sentences.cn: “自由新闻”组织再次故意不去突出强调这些事实。

sentences.en: Once again, the "Free Press" prefers not to highlight these facts.
sentences.cn: “自由新闻”组织再次故意不去突出强调这些事实。

sentences.en: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.cn: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

sentences.en: The clothes a snug fit and highlight the woman's body underneath.
sentences.cn: 服装贴身的裁剪凸显了女性的身姿.

sentences.en: The highlight of my day used to be cooking Meg a meal when she came in from work.
sentences.cn: 过去，我一天中最有意思的事就是在梅格下班回到家时为她做顿饭。

sentences.en: The presidential elections are the highlight of next year's political calendar.
sentences.cn: 总统选举是明年政治日程表上的大事.

sentences.en: The title is the highlight color newspaper is up important color area.
sentences.cn: 标题是彩报的亮点,是彩报重要的标色区域.

sentences.en: Those bridges and islets all highlight the garden scenery.
sentences.cn: 那些小桥和湖心岛格外突显了园林的景色.

sentences.en: You need to put the highlight in now.
sentences.cn: 现在你需要把强光部分画出来.

sentences.en: Your resume should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.cn: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

words.tran_cn: 增强亮度；突出性，醒目性
使…显著；以强光照射（highlight的ing形式）
最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；[电子]加亮区

trans.tran_cn: 最好的部分，挑染的头发，强光部分
trans.tran_en: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition
to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
